spell_list.description: Inflicts disease damage to enemies surrounding the Shadowknight. For every target the spell hits, the shadowknight get an increment of Reaping, which life taps with the next combat art and increases the group's potency. Higher ranks of this ability reduce the reuse time. Reaping can increment up to 8 times.
spell_list.description_pvp: Inflicts disease damage to enemies surrounding the Shadowknight. For every target the spell hits, the shadowknight get an increment of Reaping, which life taps with the next combat art and increases the group's potency. Higher ranks of this ability reduce the reuse time. Reaping can increment up to 8 times.

effect_list.description: Inflicts 3 - 5 disease damage on targets in Area of Effect
Applies Reaping.  Lasts for 30.0 seconds.
When a combat art is used this spell will cast Reap on target of combat art.  Lasts for 15.0 seconds.
Inflicts 4 - 7 disease damage on target
Increases Potency of group members (AE) by 6.0%
Heals caster for 1.5% of max health
This effect cannot be critically applied.
The healing of this spell cannot be modified except by direct means

spell_list.name: Reaper's Mist
